T02D1488:159a-1: shr'i tsakra sampa ra s'a dha na trim shi k'a pa da paddha ti /
T02D1488:159a-3: dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i sgrub thabs tshigs bcad sum cu pa /
T02D1488:159b-0: dpal @159b 'khor lo sdom pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1488:159b-1: bde legs rtags can zhabs kyi stang stabs la ni sa chen rir bcas gus 'dud cing //
T02D1488:159b-2: nyon mongs spangs pa'i rus sbal rgyal po 'phel ba'i dbugs kyis rgya mtsho kun du g-yo //
T02D1488:159b-3: gar stabs mchog dang brkyang bskum phyag tshogs rlung gis ri bo thams cad g-yo ba bzhin //
T02D1488:159b-4: dbu ni bskyod pas nyi ma zla ba ltung mdzad dpal ldan sdom pas 'gro ba bsrung //
T02D1488:159b-5: nyon mongs tshogs kyis rnam pa kun du gzir bar
T02D1488:159b-6: gyur pa'i 'gro ba 'di rnams mtha' dag mthong gyur
T02D1488:159b-7: nas // rnal 'byor dpal ldan sdom pa zhes byar
T02D1488:159b-8: gzhan la phan par mkhas pa'i slob dpon sprin zhes
T02D1488:159b-9: nas // bya ba yis // bla ma mchog gi
T02D1488:159b-10: bka' yis dbugs 'byin rab tu gsal byed de ni
T02D1488:159b-11: longs spyad bya phyir bsdus pa gang //
T02D1488:159b-12: srid dang zhi pa'i bde ster aindra bh'u ti'i zhal
T02D1488:159b-13: kyi [*gyi] rim pas rgyud las sdeb sbyor gyis dbyung
T02D1488:159b-14: bya // yid dang rjes mthun gnas su cho ga bzhin zhugs nas //
T02D1488:159b-15: byams pa la sogs tshangs pa'i gnas rnams bsam byas te //
T02D1488:159b-16: bsod nams gter chen nyer bsgrub bya phyir du //
T02D1488:159b-17: dam pa'i stong nyid ye shes rol ches brtson bya //
T02D1488:159b-18: legs bsams de nas dmar 'od rab gsal ba //
T02D1488:159b-19: re pha las byung nyi ma'i gzugs brnyan dbus //
T02D1488:159b-20: rang sngags rgyal bo cho ga bzhin bsgoms nas //
T02D1488:159b-21: de nyid kyis ni bshad pa'i rim gyis bsrungs //
T02D1488:159b-22: der ni yam yig las skyes rlung dbus su //
T02D1488:159b-23: re pha las byung me ni rnam par bsam //
T02D1488:159b-24: wam yig las skyes chu ni dkar po yang //
T02D1488:159b-25: lam yig las skyes 'dzin ma ches ser ba'o //
T02D1488:159b-26: der ni sum las skyes pa'i ri rab dbus //
T02D1488:159b-27: sangs rgyas yon tan gyis mdzes sangs rgyas gnas //
T02D1488:159b-28: de dbus sna tshogs chu skyes lte ba la //
T02D1488:159b-29: bcu drug gnyis dang brgyad cu'i sngags sgra las //
T02D1488:159b-30: legs skyes zla nyi sbyar bar rang sa bon //
T02D1488:159b-31: de mtshan de 'od stobs kyis sangs rgyas rnams //
T02D1488:159b-32: bkug cing sbyar te dag pa'i dngos po ni //
T02D1488:159b-33: dngos po'i zhen pa bral ba'i dngos po'i gzugs //
T02D1488:159b-34: dbang sngon bcag pa ltar gsal rtsa ba'i zhal //
T02D1488:159b-35: mche ba gtshigs shing cher drag spyan gsum pa //
T02D1488:159b-36: brla gnyis la ni stag bags na bza' grol //
T02D1488:160a-1: dpa' bo sdom pa bsgom par bya //
T02D1488:160a-2: ljang gu dmar dang ser po'i zhal ldan zhing //
T02D1488:160a-3: ral pa'i tshogs pa sna tshogs rdo rje 'dzin //
T02D1488:160a-4: gar dgu'i nyams dang zla tshes cod pan ldan //
T02D1488:160a-5: phyag rgya drug gis rgyas btab mgo phreng ldan //
T02D1488:160a-6: phyag gnyis glang po myos pa'i pags pa dang //
T02D1488:160a-7: rtsa ba'i phyag ni rdo rje dril bus mtshan //
T02D1488:160a-8: mdung dang kha tv'am dgra sta zhags pa dang //
T02D1488:160a-9: thod pa gri gug rnam bkra'i mtshan ma 'phyar //
T02D1488:160a-10: dam tshes yan lag dgu ni sgrogs pa'i tshul //
T02D1488:160a-11: mchog gi mdzes pa la dgyes cad te'us rol //
T02D1488:160a-12: tshangs pa'i mgo bos phyag gi padma mtshan //
T02D1488:160a-13: zhabs kyis zla nyi dbang phyug goo r'i mnan //
T02D1488:160a-14: phag mo'i phyag gi zhags pa yis ni 'khyud //
T02D1488:160a-15: bzhad pa'i 'od kyis 'jig rten khams snang byed //
T02D1488:160a-16: bo la kakko lar stsal sems pa'i tshogs //
T02D1488:160a-17: sbyor ba las byung dga' ba des sbyin rgyu //
T02D1488:160a-18: de mdun gsang ba can skyes rab bsngags ma //
T02D1488:160a-19: sgeg cing shas cher chags pa mdog nag ma //
T02D1488:160a-20: snying rje bsod nams 'od 'phro gzugs mdzes ma //
T02D1488:160a-21: skal ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa'i btsun mo'o //
T02D1488:160a-22: g-yon du de bzhin l'a ma shin tu ljang //
T02D1488:160a-23: mdzes pa'i lta stangs 'od 'phro phung po'i lus //
T02D1488:160a-24: phrag dog bdag nyid 'dod pa'i ro yis phye //
T02D1488:160a-25: nyi ma'i 'od kyis gsal ba'i lus bzang ma'o //
T02D1488:160a-26: skyon gyi zhags pa dum bu nyid byed cing //
T02D1488:160a-27: 'dod chags tshul gyur yon tan tshogs skyed ma //
T02D1488:160a-28: des na drag mo khrag ltar dmar ba'i mdog / rgyab tu dum bur bod ma bsam par bya //
T02D1488:160a-29: g-yas su btso ma'i gser gyi mdangs ltar ser //
T02D1488:160a-30: ser sna'i sems ldan ring du lta zhing mdzes //
T02D1488:160a-31: skal bzangs nga rgyal gyis mtho gzugs can ma //
T02D1488:160a-32: 'jig rten gsum gyi bde 'byung rgyur gyur ma'o //
T02D1488:160a-33: mtshams kyi thod pa bzhi ni bde sked pa'i //
T02D1488:160a-34: bdud rtsi lngas gang bum pa'i steng gnas par //
T02D1488:160a-35: bsam zhing cho ga yis ni 'khor lo gsum //
T02D1488:160a-36: khams gsum pa yi rnam pas rab tu grub //
T02D1488:160a-37: khva gdong ma ni shar gyi phyogs su gnas //
T02D1488:160a-38: mig sman bcag 'dra'i mdangs ldan khro gnyer gtsigs //
T02D1488:160a-39: byang du 'ug gdong ma ni drag chen ma //
T02D1488:160b-0: ches @160b cher ljang gu shin tu 'jigs ma bsam //
T02D1488:160b-1: mchog gi padma r'a ga ltar mdzes lus //
T02D1488:160b-2: de 'od h'a ha'i sgra yis lus mdzes ma //
T02D1488:160b-3: khyi gdong ma ni nub tu chu ngang nyir //
T02D1488:160b-4: nyi ma bye ba brgya yi 'od gzugs ldan //
T02D1488:160b-5: phag gdong ma ni khros pas dur dur sgrogs //
T02D1488:160b-6: 'di yi mthu dang bsam pa du ma ste //
T02D1488:160b-7: gser mdog mdog 'bar ba lus kyi mdangs gsal ba //
T02D1488:160b-8: lho ru phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor snang byed ma'o //
T02D1488:160b-9: 'khor lo mchog gi mtshams su lha mo bzhi //
T02D1488:160b-10: sa gnyis kyi ni kha dog 'phro zhing gsal //
T02D1488:160b-11: mche gtsigs drag cing mgrin pa'i sgra zab pa //
T02D1488:160b-12: gshin rje brtan ma la sogs 'bad pas bsgom //
T02D1488:160b-13: de ltar sgyu ma smig rgyu ltar mdzes shir //
T02D1488:160b-14: bkra bar ro gnas brgyad kyi dbus bsams nas //
T02D1488:160b-15: snying ga'i mtshan ma h'um yig 'od tshogs kyis //
T02D1488:160b-16: bkug pa'i 'khor lo dam tshig rnams kyis gzhug / byang chub 'byung ba'i rgyur gyur de nyid gsum //
T02D1488:160b-17: yan lag drug gi cho ga'i rim pas sbyar //
T02D1488:160b-18: khams sogs phung po nges par rnam sbyong ba //
T02D1488:160b-19: byang chub phyogs kyang cho ga bzhin du bsam //
T02D1488:160b-20: dbang ni dbang bskur cho ga bzhin bsgrubs nas //
T02D1488:160b-21: de bzhin mchod par kyang ni gus pas bya //
T02D1488:160b-22: bstod dang nyer spyod bdud rtsi'i btung ba sbyin //
T02D1488:160b-23: spros nas sprul pa'i nyams kyis rgyal rnams mchod //
T02D1488:160b-24: sems can ma lus sangs rgyas byang chub ni //
T02D1488:160b-25: mchog la nges sbyar der ni longs spyod sku //
T02D1488:160b-26: de nyid de bzhin chos skur nges brtags te //
T02D1488:160b-27: rnal 'byor ma yi kun sbyong tha snyad bshad //
T02D1488:160b-28: d'u t'i bha bam r'a dzi ka y'a gri h'i tam ta y'a sa ma yam sa matti /
T02D1488:160b-29: ming med dang ni mthe bong kha dag gis //
T02D1488:160b-30: chos 'byung gzugs brnyan dbus su sangs rgyas mchod //
T02D1488:160b-31: stobs dang stobs min de nyid shes //
T02D1488:160b-32: gsar sngags ro la zhes par sngags bzlas bya //
T02D1488:160b-33: gtor ma'i de nyid blo yis gtor ma sbyin //
T02D1488:160b-34: ci 'dod sgron me mchog dang 'o ma btung //
T02D1488:160b-35: h'a ro pa d'a do la nges brtags pas //
T02D1488:160b-36: yid ni rtag tu 'jigs par mi 'gyur ba //
T02D1488:160b-37: ye shes 'char ba'i snang ba mchog gis ni //
T02D1488:160b-38: rtag chad rmongs pa'i mun nag che gzhom bya //
T02D1488:161a-1: bde ba'i bdag nyid dkyil 'khor te //
T02D1488:161a-2: rdor pad sbyor las 'pho med thugs rdo rje //
T02D1488:161a-3: bla ma'i man ngag dad pas de bzhin nyid //
T02D1488:161a-4: bris las bdag gis bsod nams gang thob des //
T02D1488:161a-5: sems can rnams kyis dpal ldan rdo rje yi //
T02D1488:161a-6: theg par bstan pa'i phun tshogs sangs rgyas ni //
T02D1488:161a-7: bde pa'i rang bzhin khams gsum pa las 'das //
T02D1488:161a-8: ro gcig gcig pa g-yo ba brtan gyur cig /
T02D1488:161a-9: dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i sgrub thabs tshigs bcad sum
T02D1488:161a-10: cu pa // slob dpon sprin gyi bzhon pa'i lhas mdzad pa 'di //
T02D1488:161a-11: pandi ta tshul khrims 'byung gnas blo gros kyis mdzad
T02D1488:161a-12: pa'i 'grel pa'i rgya dpe la legs par bltas te
T02D1488:161a-13: / chos kyi rje rin po che sprul pa'i sku
T02D1488:161a-14: zhva dmar cod pan 'dzin pa bzhi pa dpal chos
T02D1488:161a-15: kyi grags pa ye shes dpal bzang po'i zhal snga
T02D1488:161a-17: zha lu lo ts'a ba dharma p'a la bha dra zhes bgyi bas /
T02D1488:161a-18: gzhis kha lhun grub gling du mi'i dbang po dpon
T02D1488:161a-19: chen kun dga' rin chen rgyal po pa'i bdag rkyen
